{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.07488v1", "title": "Mass-subcritical Half-Wave Equation with mixed nonlinearities: existence
  and non-existence of ground states", "summary": "We consider the problem of existence of constrained minimizers for the
focusing mass-subcritical Half-Wave equation with a defocusing mass-subcritical
perturbation. We show the existence of a critical mass such that minimizers do
exist for any mass larger than or equal to the critical one, and do not exist
below it. At the dynamical level, in the one dimensional case, we show that the
ground states are orbitally stable.", "main_category": "math.AP", "categories": "math.AP,math-ph,math.MP", "published": "2025-04-10T06:43:17Z"}
